================================[]{
[**Government Tender Announcement**](#government-tender-announcement)

**Title**: {number} W7701-237781 - Advanced Numerical Modelling and Simulations {opened}
================================[
Recently, the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) published a Request for Proposal (RFP) to select a contractor for providing technical services in numerical modelling and simulations {opened}, including technical advice, training, and assistance with software related to modelling and simulations.

A detailed request for the proposal can be found in the procurement notice {url}, which has been made available to interested parties. This Request for Proposal aims to meet the needs of Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC) for the provision of advanced numerical modelling and simulation services.

** Bidder Requirements **

Bidders must provide statements about their qualifications, technical skills, and ability to meet the proposed timelines. Bid evaluation will be conducted based on the combined total score of the technical proposal and price.

** Important Deadlines **

*   Tender closure date: March 19, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
*   Publication date: February 2, 2024

** Additional Details **

This project will be conducted under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and requires the selected contractor to deliver services in Valcartier, Quebec, Canada. A contract duration is not specified, which indicates that the project requirements will be detailed in the proposal request. There may be potential implications on services delivery timelines for incomplete responses.


Contact Information
-----------------

Phan, Stephen (SPAC/PSPC) can be reached at [stephen.phan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:stephen.phan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) for any additional information on this RFP.

Full Proposals should be submitted electronically to the specified contact email, and be clearly labeled with the RFP reference number W7701-237781.

Please make sure to review all the details in the proposal request to ensure compliance with the tender requirements. Any questions regarding this RFP proposal are welcome to be inquired about the details for submission.
